block.name: Repeat
block.doc: Interpolate a stream by repeating each input value a specified number of times. Note that the output sample rate is the input sample rate times the specified Interpolation value.

param.name: Type
param.doc: Specifies the data type of the input and output streams.

option.name: Complex
option.doc: Input and output streams are complex.

option.name: Float
option.doc: Input and output streams are real.

option.name: Int
option.doc: Input and output streams are 32-bit integer.

option.name: Short
option.doc: Input and output streams are 16-bit integer.

option.name: Byte
option.doc: Input and output streams are 8-bit integer.

param.name: Interpolation
param.doc: Specifies the number of times each value will be repeated.

param.name: Vec Length
param.doc: Specifies the vector length for vector processing. Typical applications will use the default value of 1.
